BreadcrumbDescription: Removing Elias' finger from the altar caused the temple to sink further into the murky waters. I was able to escape, but only barely.
BreadcrumbHeader: Speak with Lorath in Rotspill Delta
Name: Fragments of Mortality
Phase40Description: Removing Elias' finger from the altar caused the temple to sink further into the murky waters. I was able to escape, but only barely.
Phase40OutsideSubzoneHeader: Bring Elias' Mummified Finger to Lorath in Rotspill Delta
Phase43Description: I found Lorath tending to Neyrelle. Luckily it appears as though she will survive. I explained what I found in the sunken temple. It's time to burn Elias' finger and break his immortality.
Phase43OutsideSubzoneHeader: Burn Elias' Mummified Finger on the campfire in Rotspill Delta
Phase46Description: The fire has roused Neyrelle. I should check on her.
Phase46OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Neyrelle in Rotspill Delta
